118 mins. (unrated extended version)CountryUnited StatesLanguageEnglish Budget$20 millionBox office$169,871,719

Superbad is a 2007 American teen sex comedy movie. It was produced by Judd Apatow, Evan Goldberg, Seth Rogen and Shauna Robertson and was directed by Greg Mottola. Superbad was released on August 17, 2007 in North America. The movie received positive reviews with a 88% rating on Rotten Tomatoes and a 76 out of 100 from Metacritic.

Jonah Hill as Seth

Michael Cera as Evan

Christopher Mintz-Plasse as Fogell/McLovin'

Emma Stone as Jules

Bill Hader as Officer Slater

Seth Rogen as Officer Michaels

Martha MacIsaac as Becca

Aviva Baumann as Nicola

Joe Lo Truglio as Francis the Driver

Kevin Corrigan as Mark

Clark Duke as Teen at the Party
